comm

Interface I_PCDI_Listener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JPanelAdvanced, JPanelConfig, JPanelCurrentController, JPanelInertia, JPanelOverview, JPanelParams, JPanelPositionController, JPanelScope, JPanelSingleParam, JPanelSpeedController, MainWindow

    public interface I_PCDI_Listener
    I_PCDI_Listener

    this class is the interface of the PCDI Listener. It is usually implemented by the upper layer (for example a GUI) to communicate with the device. The upper layer gets notified if data is received or the connection changes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void notifyCommandExcecuted(PCDI_COMMANDS command, int deviceId)
      notifies listener if a command has been executed
      void notifyCommandInvalid(PCDI_COMMANDS command, int deviceId)
      notifies if the device could not handle a command
      void notifyConnectionChanges(boolean isConnected)
      informs listener about connectionchanges
      void notifyError(PCDI_ERROR_TYPE error, int deviceId)
      notifies the listener if an error occured
      void notifyOscilloscopeData(PCDI_OscilloscopeData data, int deviceId)
      notifies the listener about incoming oscilloscope data
      void notifyOscilloscopeStateAnswer(PCDI_OSCILLOSCOPE_STATE osci_state, int deviceId)
      notifies the listener about the oscilloscope state
      void notifyParameterInfo(PCDI_ParameterInfo parameter, int deviceId)
      notifies the listener about the requested parameter information
      void notifyParameterInvalid(int valueNr, int deviceId)
      notifies the listener if the requested parameter value number was invalid
      void notifyParameterRead(PCDI_Parameter<?> parameter, int deviceId)
      notifies the listener about a successfully read parameter
      void notifyParameterWrite(PCDI_Parameter<?> parameter, int deviceId)
      notifies listener if a parameter has been written

    • Method Detail

      • notifyConnectionChanges

        void notifyConnectionChanges(boolean isConnected)
        informs listener about connectionchanges
        Parameters:
        isConnected - new connection state

      • notifyParameterWrite

        void notifyParameterWrite(PCDI_Parameter<?> parameter,
                          int deviceId)
        notifies listener if a parameter has been written
        Parameters:
        parameter - the written parameter (inclusive values)
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device

      • notifyCommandExcecuted

        void notifyCommandExcecuted(PCDI_COMMANDS command,
                            int deviceId)
        notifies listener if a command has been executed
        Parameters:
        command - is the command which has been executed
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device

      • notifyParameterRead

        void notifyParameterRead(PCDI_Parameter<?> parameter,
                         int deviceId)
        notifies the listener about a successfully read parameter
        Parameters:
        parameter - the parameter with its value
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device

      • notifyParameterInfo

        void notifyParameterInfo(PCDI_ParameterInfo parameter,
                         int deviceId)
        notifies the listener about the requested parameter information
        Parameters:
        parameter - the requested parameter information
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device

      • notifyCommandInvalid

        void notifyCommandInvalid(PCDI_COMMANDS command,
                          int deviceId)
        notifies if the device could not handle a command
        Parameters:
        command - that could not be handled
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device

      • notifyParameterInvalid

        void notifyParameterInvalid(int valueNr,
                            int deviceId)
        notifies the listener if the requested parameter value number was invalid
        Parameters:
        valueNr - the invalid parameter number
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device

      • notifyOscilloscopeData

        void notifyOscilloscopeData(PCDI_OscilloscopeData data,
                            int deviceId)
        notifies the listener about incoming oscilloscope data
        Parameters:
        data - the data arrived
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device

      • notifyError

        void notifyError(PCDI_ERROR_TYPE error,
                 int deviceId)
        notifies the listener if an error occured
        Parameters:
        error - which occured
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device

      • notifyOscilloscopeStateAnswer

        void notifyOscilloscopeStateAnswer(PCDI_OSCILLOSCOPE_STATE osci_state,
                                   int deviceId)
        notifies the listener about the oscilloscope state
        Parameters:
        osci_state - the actual oscilloscope-state of the device
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device
